__e: Children, I don't know how to break this to you... but Principal Skinner is... missing.
Well, Skinner isn't here, is he?
Do you think you could call me "Unky Herb"? -No problemo, Unky Herb.
Assistant Director Skinner took him from here to the hospital.
I got the call from Skinner on my way over here.
Something that changed Skinner and you.
I work with Assistant Director Skinner. I'd like to speak with him.
Me and Skinner were looking for him.
